title: Project initialization and dependencies
description: Create `src/backend/` directory structure with `pyproject.toml` defining all dependencies (fastapi[standard], strawberry-graphql[fastapi], sqlalchemy[asyncio]>=2.0, asyncpg, alembic, pgvector, python-ulid, pydantic-settings, uvicorn[standard], pytest, pytest-asyncio, httpx, ruff). Create empty `app/` directory with `__init__.py`, `db/`, `models/`, `graphql/`, `seed/`, and `tests/` subdirectories. Create `docker-compose.yml` with pgvector/pgvector:pg16 service configured for local development (user: tribe, password: tribe, db: tribe, port 5432).
acceptance_criteria:
- `src/backend/pyproject.toml` exists with all required dependencies
- All subdirectories created with `__init__.py` files
- `docker-compose.yml` configured with pgvector/pgvector:pg16
- `docker compose up -d` starts PostgreSQL successfully
- Project structure matches spec exactly
